item.title: 华尔街领涨，亚洲股市攀升；人民币、欧元下挫
item.description: 继隔夜华尔街股市创下历史新高后，周二亚洲股市在表现出色的科技板块带动下上涨，而美元兑日元汇率则在六周低点附近徘徊，因为交易员们在权衡美国和日本的利率前景。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Tuesday led by an outperforming tech sector following record highs on Wall Street overnight, while the dollar hovered near a six-week low to the yen as traders weighed the outlook for interest rates in the United States and Japan.】

item.title: 特朗普重申反对新日铁收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一表示，一系列税收优惠和关税措施将重振美国著名企业美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel），同时他重申反对新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）计划以 150 亿美元收购该公司。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said on Monday a series of tax incentives and tariffs will revive storied American firm U.S. Steel , as he reiterated his opposition to Nippon Steel's planned $15 billion purchase of the company.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议前油价变化不大
item.description: 周二，油价在好坏参半的市场信号中下挫，交易商正在等待本周欧佩克+会议的结果。【原文：Oil prices inched down amid mixed market signals on Tuesday, with traders awaiting the outcome of an OPEC+ meeting this week.】

item.title: 欧元和人民币疲软，美元走高
item.description: 由于法国的政治动荡削弱了欧元，美元在周二表现强劲，而关税风险和中国经济的疲软则将人民币推至一年低点。【原文：The dollar was buoyant on Tuesday as political turmoil in France undermined the euro, while tariff risks and weakness in China's economy pushed the yuan to a one-year low.】

item.title: 内部备忘录称嘉吉公司计划裁减约 5%的全球员工
item.description: 根据路透社周二查阅的一份内部备忘录，全球贸易公司嘉吉计划在全球范围内裁员约 5%。【原文：Global trading house Cargill plans to cut around 5% of its worldwide employees, according to an internal memo reviewed by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 埃克森公司称将继续就圭亚那拍卖的浅水区块进行谈判
item.description: 埃克森美孚发言人周一表示，美国石油巨头埃克森美孚及其合作伙伴正继续与圭亚那政府就开发浅水石油区块的条件进行谈判。【原文：U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil and partners are continuing to negotiate with Guyana's government on the terms for developing a shallow-water oil block, an Exxon spokesperson said on Monday.】

item.title: 解说员：法官在特斯拉薪酬案中作出不利于马斯克的裁决后，马斯克的下一步该怎么走？
item.description: 特拉华州一名法官周一裁定，尽管特斯拉股东投票支持首席执行官马斯克的薪酬协议，但特斯拉不能向埃隆-马斯克支付 560 亿美元的薪酬。【原文：Tesla cannot give Elon Musk a $56 billion compensation package despite a vote in support of the CEO's pay deal by the company's shareholders, a Delaware judge ruled on Monday.】

item.title: 潘兴广场将从阿姆斯特丹泛欧交易所退市
item.description: 在亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）上个月敦促公司董事会之后，Pershing Square Holdings 周一表示，公司计划将其股票从阿姆斯特丹泛欧交易所退市。【原文：Pershing Square Holdings said on Monday it plans to delist its shares from Euronext Amsterdam, after billionaire Bill Ackman urged its board last month.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔在与庞巴迪达成协议后下调销售额和利润预期
item.description: 霍尼韦尔公司周一下调了第四季度和全年的利润和销售预期，以考虑到与庞巴迪飞机航空相关技术协议有关的投资。【原文：Honeywell on Monday cut its profit and sales forecasts for the fourth quarter and the full year to take into account investments associated with an agreement to provide aviation-related technology for Bombardier's aircraft.】

item.title: 陷入困境的巴西咖啡贸易商背后的银行可能遭受 1.81 亿美元的损失
item.description: 路透社周一看到的法庭文件显示，为上周寻求法院监督下的债务重组的两家巴西咖啡贸易商提供资金的银行与这两家公司共有 11 亿雷亚尔（1.816 亿美元）的信贷。【原文：Banks which financed two Brazilian coffee traders that last week sought court-supervised debt restructuring have a total of 1.1 billion reais ($181.6 million) in credit with the firms, court documents seen by Reuters showed on Monday.】

item.title: 研究称，航空公司转用绿色喷气燃料的速度不够快
item.description: 总部位于布鲁塞尔的倡导组织 "运输与环境 "的一项研究显示，世界上大多数航空公司在改用可持续喷气燃料方面做得不够，该研究还发现，石油生产商在转型方面的投资太少。【原文：Most of the world's airlines are not doing enough to switch to sustainable jet fuel, according to a study by Brussels-based advocacy group Transport and Environment, which also found too little investment by oil producers in the transition.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会就勒索软件攻击与中国工商银行达成和解，未处以罚款
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已就对中国工商银行一家单位的记录保存指控达成和解，该指控涉及 2023 年 11 月的勒索软件攻击，但决定不处以民事罚款。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has settled record keeping charges against an Industrial and Commercial Bank of China unit concerning a November 2023 ransomware attack, but decided not to impose a civil fine.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司与墨菲家族风险投资公司达成交易，减少养猪足迹
item.description: 全球最大的猪肉加工商史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周一表示，将向墨菲家族风险投资公司（Murphy Family Ventures）出售 15 万头母猪。【原文：Smithfield Foods, the world's biggest pork processor, said on Monday it will sell 150,000 female pigs to Murphy Family Ventures.】

item.title: 特拉华州法官驳回恢复埃隆-马斯克 56 亿美元特斯拉赔偿金的请求
item.description: 特拉华州一名法官周一裁定，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）仍无权领取 560 亿美元的补偿金，尽管该电动汽车公司的股东投票赞成恢复该补偿金。【原文：A Delaware judge ruled on Monday that Tesla CEO Elon Musk still is not entitled to receive a $56 billion compensation package despite shareholders of the electric vehicle company voting to reinstate it.】

item.title: 在华尔街工作超过 60 年的老将阿特-卡申去世，享年 83 岁
item.description: 在华尔街工作了 60 多年的瑞银集团纽约证券交易所大堂运营总监 Art Cashin 去世，享年 83 岁。【原文：Art Cashin, UBS' director of floor operations at the New York Stock Exchange who spent more than 60 years on Wall Street, has died aged 83.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元走强抑制多头
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 随着物价压力进一步降温，美联储威廉姆斯希望进一步减息
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周一表示，随着通胀压力继续降温，美国央行可能会在一段时间内进一步降低利率目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said on Monday the U.S. central bank is likely to lower its interest rate target further over time as inflation pressures continue to cool.】

item.title: 通用汽车将向 LG Energy Solution 出售其在密歇根电池厂的股份
item.description: 通用汽车公司周一表示，由于底特律汽车制造商正在缩减其电动汽车计划，该公司将向合作伙伴 LG Energy Solution 出售其在密歇根州兰辛的合资电池厂的股份。【原文：General Motors said Monday it will sell its stake in its joint venture battery plant in Lansing, Michigan, to partner LG Energy Solution as the Detroit automaker trims its electric vehicle plans.】

item.title: 由于价格上涨，美国 11 月份对欧洲的液化天然气出口量激增
item.description: 根据金融公司 LSEG 的初步数据，11 月份美国对欧洲的液化天然气出口量激增，因为世界上最大的超冷天然气生产商向欧洲大陆出口了更多的货物，而向亚洲和拉丁美洲出口的货物则有所减少。【原文：U.S. LNG exports to Europe surged in November as the world's largest producer of the superchilled gas sent more cargoes to the continent and fewer to Asia and Latin America, according to preliminary data from financial firm LSEG.】

item.title: 美国国务院批准可能向印度出售价值 11.7 亿美元的直升机设备
item.description: 五角大楼周一表示，美国国务院已批准可能向印度出售 MH-60R 海鹰直升机的设备和后续支持，估计费用为 11.7 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale of equipment and follow-on support for MH-60R Seahawk helicopters to India for an estimated cost of $1.17 billion, the Pentagon said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔表示目前倾向于在 12 月降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周一表示，他倾向于在12月17-18日的会议上下调基准利率，因为货币政策仍然具有足够的限制性，足以继续对通胀造成下行压力，而劳动力市场大致处于平衡状态，这是美联储希望保持的。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said on Monday he was inclined to cut the benchmark interest rate at the Dec. 17-18 meeting as monetary policy remained restrictive enough to keep putting downward pressure on inflation, while the labor market was roughly in balance, something the Fed wants to maintain.】

item.title: 美国针对中国芯片业出台新限制措施
item.description: 美国周一对中国半导体行业发起了三年来的第三次大规模打击，除其他举措外，还限制了对包括芯片设备制造商瑙鲁科技集团在内的140家公司的出口。【原文：The United States on Monday launched its third big crackdown in three years on China's semiconductor industry, curbing exports to 140 companies, including chip equipment maker Naura Technology Group , among other moves.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通投资银行部主席离职
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份内部备忘录，华尔街巨头摩根大通投资银行部全球主席珍妮弗-纳森（Jennifer Nason）将在近四十年后于明年初离职。【原文：Wall Street giant JPMorgan Chase's global chair of investment banking Jennifer Nason is set to leave the bank early next year after almost four decades, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 杜克大学在特朗普执政前暂停评估美国能源贷款计划
item.description: 根据上周提交的一份文件，杜克能源公司正在暂停对某些美国能源基础设施改善贷款的评估，理由是在特朗普政府的领导下，未来的资金来源存在不确定性。【原文：Duke Energy is pausing its assessment of certain U.S. energy infrastructure improvement loans, citing uncertainty over the future of funding under the Trump administration, according to a filing from last week.】

item.title: 首席执行官塔瓦雷斯离开 Stellantis，市场猜测继任者人选
item.description: 卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）在周日突然辞去 Stellantis 首席执行官一职，两个月前该公司曾发布盈利预警，该汽车制造商表示将在明年上半年任命一位永久继任者。【原文：Carlos Tavares abruptly resigned on Sunday as CEO of Stellantis , two months after a profit warning, and the carmaker said it would seek to appoint a permanent successor in the first half of next year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Stellantis 考虑由 Picat 和 Filosa 担任首席执行官
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士周一透露，Stellantis 董事会正在考虑将其北美业务主管 Antonio Filosa 和采购主管 Maxime Picat 作为首席执行官职位的内部候选人。【原文：The board of Stellantis is considering its head of North American operations, Antonio Filosa, and procurement chief Maxime Picat as internal candidates for the CEO position, a source close to the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 综述 大型对冲基金因特朗普当选而获益
item.description: 路透社获得的数据显示，尽管紧张的民调使投资组合经理更难进行定位，但美国总统大选的动荡局势使许多价值数十亿美元的对冲基金在 11 月份获得了收益。【原文：A number of multi-billion dollar hedge funds gained in November, numbers obtained by Reuters show, riding the volatility of the U.S. presidential election despite tight polling making positioning more difficult for portfolio managers.】

item.title: 苹果公司被控压制员工、监视个人设备
item.description: 苹果公司在一项新的诉讼中被指控非法监控其员工的个人设备和 iCloud 账户，同时还禁止他们讨论自己的薪酬和工作条件。【原文：Apple has been accused in a new lawsuit of illegally monitoring its workers' personal devices and iCloud accounts while also barring them from discussing their pay and working conditions.】

item.title: PG&E启动24亿美元股权融资后股价下跌
item.description: 周一，PG&E 公司股价下跌约 7%，此前这家电力和天然气公司宣布计划通过发行股票向投资者筹集 24 亿美元。【原文：Shares of PG&E Corp fell about 7% on Monday after the power and natural gas company announced that it planned to raise $2.4 billion from investors via a stock offering.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：通胀率继续下降的基本情况不变
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周一表示，他对是否在美联储 12 月会议上再次降息持开放态度，即将公布的就业数据将对这一决定产生重要影响。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Monday he has an open mind about whether to cut interest rates again at the Fed's December meeting, with upcoming data on jobs important in shaping the decision.】
